Methods in suncertify.business that throw RecordNotFoundException
 void BookingBusinessAdapter.bookContractor(long recNo, java.lang.String custNo)
          Books a particular Contractor using the combined name and location field as the primary key to locate the record, and an eight digit customer number to update the owner field.

          Books a particular Contractor using the combined name and location field as the primary key to locate the record, and an eight digit customer number to update the owner field.

          Checks to see if a particular contractor record has already been booked.
